lead_paragraph: Dana Stubblefield, a former San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman charged with raping a developmentally delayed woman, denied the charges.
snippet: Dana Stubblefield, a former San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman charged with raping a developmentally delayed woman, denied the charges.
abstract: Former San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman Dana Stubblefield denies he raped developmentally delayed woman; asserts she was mentally competent and encounter was consensual.
